questions.question: 毎朝、駅（＿）自転車で行きます。
questions.hint:
Place + まで - "as far as/to" (movement destination)
毎朝(まいあさ)、駅(えき)、自転車(じてんしゃ)

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「駅まで」 means "to the station."

  • では - at/in
  • ので - because
  • しか - only (needs negative verb)
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect
The correct answer is まで (to the station).

questions.question: この薬は食後（＿）飲んでください。
questions.hint:
Time/Event + に - specific timing
薬(くすり)、食後(しょくご)

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「食後に」 indicates "after meals."

  • で - place or method
  • を - object marker
  • が - subject marker
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect
The correct answer is に, which shows the timing of the action.

questions.question: 図書館の本を全部（＿）返しました。
questions.hint:
～て form - shows sequence of actions
図書館(としょかん)、全部(ぜんぶ)、返す(かえす)

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「借りて返しました」 means "borrowed and returned."

  • 買って - bought
  • 売って - sold
  • 探して - searched
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect
The correct answer is 借りて, which logically precedes "returned" when referring to library books.

questions.question: 先生の質問に（＿）答えられませんでした。
questions.hint:
Adverb + verb - shows how an action is performed
質問(しつもん)、答える(こたえる)

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「正しく答えられませんでした」 means "couldn't answer correctly."

  • 遅く - slowly
  • 楽しく - enjoyably
  • 美しく - beautifully
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect
The correct answer is 正しく, the only one that fits the context of answering a question.
